name: LIZARDFOLK GEOMANCER

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The lizardfolk makes two Earth Burst attacks.

actions.name: Earth Burst
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hail of Stone (Recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point the lizardfolk can see within 60 feet. Failure: 15 (6d4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Prone condition. Success: Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The lizardfolk casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12): At Will: Elementalism 1/Day Each: Meld into Stone, Speak with Plants, Spike Growth
